subject: Horse Racing
Horses
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
lead_paragraph: The Nebraska Racing Hall of Fame trainer David Anderson has been suspended for three years and fined $4,000 for being suspected of racing two horses that had been injected with banned painkillers.
snippet: The Nebraska Racing Hall of Fame trainer David Anderson has been suspended for three years and fined $4,000 for being suspected of racing two horses that had been injected with banned painkillers.
